Chicopee.Sixteen Acres: Sixteen Acres is a neighborhood in the southeastern part of Springfield, Massachusetts, located about 3 miles (5 km) from Metro Center. It is Springfield's largest neighborhood, containing 4,506 acres (1,824 ha) plus rights of way and water bodies. Principal boundaries are Watershops Pond and the North Branch of the Mill River to the north; the town of East Longmeadow to the south; Schneelock Brook to the west; and the town of Wilbraham to the east.
